short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Vaux Tab Manager and Window Organizer

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Vaux is an intuitive window manager with many robust features and simple interface. Perfect for tab management and window organization. Take your organizing skills to the max with Vaux!

Latest feature: Share your saved windows with other Vaux users!

Features:

Tab manager
Window position recall
Share windows with other Vaux users.
Dark Theme Icon. Toggle icon from options page.
